item.title: About me
item.description:
First release in '92, a nerd, programmer. Version 0.2.3

Hi, I'm Ryekee Zhong, study Intelligence Science and Technology in Xidian University. And now I am the Chairman of XDU-MSTC.

This is a brand new blog for me, I use Pelican to create a blog on Github. And my main blog RyekeeBlog is still working with Wordpress.

You can visit here to view more information about me.
item.dc:creator: Ryekee
